example.eg: Tom held the book open with his thumb.
example.egtrans: 汤姆用拇指卡主书页，使书保持打开的状态。

example.eg: Lisa thumbed the pages of the book, searching for the quotation she wanted.
example.egtrans: 丽莎翻动着书页，想找她需要的那段话。

example.eg: Mark thumbed the material, feeling its quality.
example.egtrans: 马克用拇指摸了摸材料，感受材料的质量。

example.eg: The ball of my thumb hurts while I'm playing the violin.
example.egtrans: 我拉小提琴的时候伤到了拇指肚。

dsense.name: green fingers
dsense.guideword: figurative, mainly UK (fondness for or skill at gardening)

example.eg: My grandmother kept a beautiful garden and was known for her green fingers.
example.egtrans: 我祖母有一个漂亮的花园，并且因为她擅长园艺而远近闻名。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 绿手指, 园艺能手, 园艺爱好, 高超园艺技能

example.eg: The garden is looking beautiful, thanks to Jill's green thumb.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 绿拇指, 有园艺才能

dsense.name: have a green thumb, have green thumbs (mainly US), have green fingers (mainly UK)

example.eg: My mother has a green thumb: everything she touches grows well.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 善于园艺, 善于种花种草

example.eg: The rule of thumb when doing laundry is to keep light and dark clothes separate.
example.egtrans: 洗衣服的一般法则就是将浅色与深色的衣物分开洗涤。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 粗略的估算法, 一般法则，粗略指南

dsense.name: thumb a ride, also UK: thumb a lift

example.eg: We had to thumb a lift to Glasgow as we had no money left for the bus.

dsense.name: thumb index
dsense.guideword: (tabs on edge of a book's pages)

example.eg: I thumbed through the pile of bills, just to see if any were past due.
